title: Inside Iran's Revolutionary Guards
text:
A U.S. military image taken from a U.S. Navy MH-60R helicopter in the Gulf of Oman in waters between Gulf Arab states and Iran on June 13, 2019 showing personnel that the Pentagon says are members of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps Navy...more

A U.S. military image taken from a U.S. Navy MH-60R helicopter in the Gulf of Oman in waters between Gulf Arab states and Iran on June 13, 2019 showing personnel that the Pentagon says are members of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps Navy removing an unexploded limpet mine from the M/T Kokuka Courageous, a Japanese owned commercial motor tanker. U.S. Navy/via REUTERS

Close
description: A boat of the Iranian Revolutionary Guard at undisclosed location off the coast of Bandar Abbas, Iran August 2019.      Nazanin Tabatabaee/WANA
